title: Viral Hoax Claims Weapons Seized From Mosques In J&K
subtitle: The images are from 2016 when Gujarat police busted an illegal weapons racket operating out of a hotel.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"The central gov't has taken custody of all masjids and it's seizures in Kashmir."

The images are from 2016 when Gujarat police busted an illegal weapons racket operating out of a hotel and not from mosques in the state of Jammu And Kashmir. The photograph of guns lying on the table and sofa revealed that it was picked up from a Tumblr post on guns dated March 3, 2019. The same images were earlier viral with the false claim that weapons were seized from a mosque in Gujarat. BOOM had earlier debunked these image on July 24, 2019.
